Question: This person tore off her clothes and covered him with them.
Hints: It seems that in reality Antony wanted this person’s promise to support his intended war against the Parthians.
This person's son by Caesar, Caesarion, was proclaimed pharaoh by the Egyptians, after Alexandria fell to Octavian.
Egyptians thought this person was a reincarnation of the goddess Isis, as she called herself Nea Isis.
